plot outline: Jigar, Harry and Laddi dream of settling in Canada against their parents' wishes. In order to go there they contact the travel agent Chawla who is ready to send them there for 15 million per person. Somehow they manage to get the amount and set off for their journey. But they are told to take a flight to Bangkok first, stay there for 3 days and then go further. But once they land in Bangkok, Chawla seems to disappear.
title: Canada Di Flight
plot: Three friends, who nurture dreams to move to Canada and make a life there, fall for the trick of a travel agent who takes money from them and disappears after leaving them stranded in Bangkok.

Jigar, Harry and Laddi dream of settling in Canada against their parents' wishes. In order to go there they contact the travel agent Chawla who is ready to send them there for 15 million per person. Somehow they manage to get the amount and set off for their journey. But they are told to take a flight to Bangkok first, stay there for 3 days and then go further. But once they land in Bangkok, Chawla seems to disappear.
